original_text: He was unto me as a bear lying in wait, and as a lion in secret places.
korean_text: 그는 내게 대하여 엎드려 기다리는 곰과 은밀한 곳에 있는 사자 같으사

sentences.original_text: He was unto me as a bear lying in wait
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내게 기다리고 있는 곰 같았으며

sentences.original_text: and as a lion in secret places
